title: shrI pati
sahitya:
shrI pati nanu vEga ceyi baTTa rAdA cirakAlamu ninnu cintimpa lEdA


anupallavi



caraNam 1    E proddu jUcina iTuvaNTi vAtA ibharAja varadAnikkida mariyAdA
    caraNam 2    EvarEmannArurA yadukula sOmA vivaramugA balkavE jita kAmA
    caraNam 3    kUrimitO nannu koluvaga lEdA E rItinanina nannika brOvarAdA
    caraNam 4    nepamu lEka nApai neramencEvu kapaTamukAkaTa kaNTa jUcEvu
    caraNam 5    dayadOTa gOpAladAsuni jUci bhayamu jendakumani pakkaku pilaci
